title: Звёзды сошлись
overview: The Stars Aligned project is a meeting place for representatives of pop music, cinema, art and other creative professions.The discussion of the star-studded NTV project can center on anything except politics. What the whole country talks about in the kitchen, argues about on the forum or gossips on a bench near the house - from a new photo shoot of a famous ballerina to the unexpected birth of children from a surrogate mother of another artist, from a scandal on the Internet to the wedding or divorce of a celebrity. Famous people and experts, together with the hosts, will turn the studio into a platform for publicity, a tribune for exchanging opinions, because "Stars Aligned" so that they can finally be heard! They will thoroughly understand the situation, convey alternative points of view to viewers with the help of scientific data, reports, interviews with participants and witnesses of events, as well as the opinions of authoritative experts.
